actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide premium pay for employees for time in an on-call status away from their duty posts.

summary.text: Entitles any employee of the Airway Facilities Division of the Federal Aviation Administration to premium pay at a specified rate for periods of time during which such employee is required to remain in an on-call status away from his or her duty post.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide premium pay for employees for time in an on-call status away from their duty posts.
